Reviews.Title: All i need in small phone...
Reviews.Author: Alaa "Astors"
Reviews.Content: This little machine is amazingly fast, the OS is very responsive and fluid, no lags as far as i own it, keep in mind using an app killer from the market to keep your phone running swiftly, writing is just fine with the classic alphanumeric on screen keyboard and predictive writing, the screen manages sunlight fine, and the goodies and features of android are a huge advantage of this phone.

Reviews.Title: Beware! It's a defective phone.
Reviews.Author: Baljinder Singh

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo3ROU6MIFFRCZ8currentClick) { return cv_mo3ROU6MIFFRCZ8currentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:16 MinsI didn't do much research before buying this phone and now I'm paying for it. After buying this phone, I found out that the phone has a manufacturing defect that can't be fixed. The phone gets hot after minor use, which automatically activates its capacitive touch buttons. This in turn leads to the "menu and screen dance," where different menus and screens keep popping up automatically. Check out the attached video to see this problem in action. You can find thousands of people on internet who are facing the same issue. The phone is useless and the seller has washed his hands off by not providing any US warranty. If I talk to Sony customer service, they tell me that this is not a US phone and so they can't do anything about it. Why is the seller selling a defective product in the first place? Donate your money or do something better with it rather than wasting it this way.

Reviews.Title: Excelente .....
Reviews.Author: VICTOR RENDON PARRAGA
Reviews.Content: Definitivamente otro acierto de sony, compre este teléfono por la herencia de los sony xperia, me ha ido muy bien con este, resiste bastante a los golpes, y al maltrato, se me ha hasta mojado el celular y no ha dado problemas, lo tengo actualizado con versión android 4.0.4, 32 Gb de memoria de almacenamiento, y con el 75% de esta llena y es una bala....

Reviews.Title: Muy buen equipo
Reviews.Author: Estévez
Reviews.Content: Es de lo mejor este equipo, ya lo he actualizado y va de 10, se los recomiendo 100% al igual que el vendedor

Reviews.Title: Horrible! Junke! Trash!
Reviews.Author: Maurilio
Reviews.Content: After  60 days of usage the device start to getting heat and the Ops system becoming crazy.I've already updated the Ops system several times, but the bug did not fix.My bad luck - I bought an Iternational model w/o warranty - guess what? Even the the device showing a serious factory damage (look at youtube several video about this problem!) Sony Brazil is refusing to exchange to new phone.I've heard (and it's true!) that Apple has an international police of return that they accept everywhere in the World all products bought anywhere for exchange - It's necessary just to show the Invoice, sometimes they don't even ask for it in the Apple's stores.That's why Apple is what it is!!Sony, open your eyes!youtube link: [...]

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson Xperia Mini ST15i
Reviews.Author: joel
Reviews.Content: amazing phone, a compact size, very easy to use, very fast, with many practical functions, I recommend it 100%, everything is very high quality

Reviews.Title: BUEN TELEFONO
Reviews.Author: Luciano Vasquez
Reviews.Content: UN PRECIO ACEPTABLE Y UNA MUY BUENA CALIDAD. ES BIEN BUENO ESTE PRODUCTO. ME ALEGRA EL HABERLO COMPRADO A ESTE SUPLIDOR

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Alicia Lanuza "Marlon Mongalo"
Reviews.Content: im so happy with my phone,that was better than expected i really apreciate than you guys you are the best team

Reviews.Title: best
Reviews.Author: zura
Reviews.Content: Small in dimension. Big on experience. The compact-sized Xperia mini flexes its muscles with a 1 GHz processor and is the world's smallest Android smartphone with HD video recording*.*"Smallest" defines the height x width of Xperia(tm) mini compared with other available phones on the market as of June 2011.

Reviews.Title: Do not waste your money with that. Update 1/6/13
Reviews.Author: omas
Reviews.Content: Was good as it lasted,I was crazy about this phone,very good menu small in dimension with many apps and features, unfortunately after four months problems started to screen ,menus and screens popping up automatically and I cannot send any message or use the internet or even make a call without having problems as ending the call or activating the silent mode and since there is no U.S. warranty is for rubbish.Do not waste your money with that.Update: After i contacted Sony Ericson customer services they recomended to upgrade it with the android 4, i did it and my phone is back, no more pops up, no more drop calls, no more craziness. So if you have the same problem with the older android version upgrade to newest and the popping it will stop. Also i will recomend to avoid open wi-fi sources that you don't trust and sites that they can put cokies and malwares into your phone and install a good antivirus for full protection I am giving 3 stars because the issue that i have now is that after i am using my mobile data it is becoming slow and i have to restart it, and the battery it lasts less than a day, but after all i am happy that i am having my phone back.

Reviews.Title: Problems with touch screen, vibrating all time
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this phone.I bought this phone to this seller two months ago, now this phone have problems with the touch screen and always is vibrating, can not use the menus because always come back to the home screen. there is a video where you can see this problem and other users with the same problem: [...]I don't know if can apply the guarantee with this seller.

Reviews.Title: Do not waste your money and your time
Reviews.Author: Jose Dente
Reviews.Content: Please do not buy it at two hours out of the box and screen going crazy Which is Reported by MOST of the users. Do not waste your money and your time.

Reviews.Title: Excelente relacion costo/beneficio
Reviews.Author: chriscascante
Reviews.Content: El equipo es bastante compacto lo que permite llevarlo fácilmente en el bolsillo, es bastante rápido, la pantalla es muy buena aunque al momento de escribir se complica un poco por sus 3", se incluye una tarjeta de 2Gb pero solo tiene 800Mb disponibles para el usuario hay que tener esto en cuenta, la calidad del sonido ya sea en altavoz o con audífonos es bastante buena.Por el costo es un equipo muy recomendado pero si eres una persona que escribe mucho en el teléfono una mejor opción seria el Xperia Mini Pro.

Reviews.Title: Very poor performance
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I wanted to have an android phone besides my iPhone; after a year of using it, I can easily see why it's cheap. Performance is horrible, it loses the network and drops calls so often, while the iphone would show 3 or 4 bars of network coverage! Touch screen has poor sensitivity, and cloth, my ear, even the inside of my pockets are perceived by the phone as fingers sliding over the screen, and don't get me started on the browsing experience and ability to detect available Wi-Fi. I strongly advise you to either go for another phone, or save yourself the headache and money and stick to what you currently have.

DISPLAY	Type	LED-backlit LCD, capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size	320 x 480 pixels, 3.0 inches  	- Scratch-resistant surface - Accelerometer sensor for auto-rotate - Multi-touch input method - Sony Mobile BRAVIA Engine - Proximity sensor for auto turn-off - Timescape UI
EDGE	Up to 237 kbps 3G	HSDPA 7.2Mbps, HSUPA 5.76Mbps WLAN	Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, DLNA, Wi-Fi hotspot Bluetooth	Yes, v2.1 with A2DP Infrared port	No USB	Yes, v2.0 microUSB
CAMERA	Primary	5 MP, 2592x1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash Features	Geo-tagging, image stabilization, smile and face detection, touch focus Video	Yes, 720p
OS	Android OS, v2.3 (Gingerbread) CPU	1GHz Scorpion processor, Adreno 205 GPU, Qualcomm QSD8255 Snapdragon
